summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Jira Productivity Investigation SaaS application. All backend APIs (15/15) and frontend components working correctly with real data. OAuth connection established, data synced (2,658 issues, 268 users), and all investigation analytics functioning properly.
passed_tests: Backend API Health Check (15/15 endpoints passing)
OAuth Connection Status - Active connection verified
Sync Statistics - 2,658 issues, 268 users, 41 projects, 107 statuses
Investigation Analytics - Team comparison showing Sundew 69% vs US 51.3% completion
Dashboard Loading - All performance cards displaying real data
Critical Findings Alert - Displaying 4 key insights with real metrics
All 5 Dashboard Tabs Navigation - Overview, Team Comparison, Historical Trends, Accountability, Communication
Settings Page Navigation - Connection info, sync stats, manual sync button
Back to Dashboard Navigation - Smooth navigation flow
Real Data Integration - Velocity decline -66%, cycle times, stale issues (265)
Team Performance Metrics - Sundew: 1757 issues, US Team: 78 issues
Communication Breakdown Analysis - 8 waiting issues, 79 cross-team handoffs
Accountability Tracking - Stale issues and unassigned work detection
